name: Beetle Ju 3
storyline: Ju goes to the store at the request of his wife. He is already at the store’s cash desk while his wife calls him and reports, that all their children have been kidnapped. He and his 2 remaining children, are going to save all children.
summary: Compared to Beetle Ju & Beetle Ju 2 your goal is to retrieve all children from the all 100 levels in this game.
